title: Short Stories By Michael Connelly
description:
Collection of Michael Connelly's short stories previously published in print in various short story anthologies.

"Blue On Black" originally published in Hook, Line And Sinister.
"Blood Washes Off" originally published in The Rich And The Dead.
"Homicide Special" originally published in the special edition of The Drop for Waterstones.
"A Fine Mist Of Blood" originally published in Vengeance.
"The Perfect Triangle" originally published in The Dark End Of The Street.
"After Midnight" originally published in Men From Boys.
"Shortcut" originally published in Half-Minute Horrors.

Compiled by eltiomolonio.
"Homicide Special" courtesy of Alan B.

contents:

Blue On Black (A Harry Bosch Story)
Blood Washes Off (A Harry Bosch Story)
Homicide Special (A Harry Bosch Story)
A Fine Mist Of Blood (A Harry Bosch Story)
The Perfect Triangle (A Mickey Haller Story)
After Midnight
Shortcut

epub and mobi.
